pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Comprehensive, General Purpose Population Genetics Analysis Package // Allows the calculation of both genetic diversity partition statistics, genetic differentiation statistics, and locus informativeness for ancestry assignment. It also provides users with various option to calculate bootstrapped 95\% confidence intervals both across loci, for pairwise population comparisons, and to plot these results interactively. Parallel computing capabilities and pairwise results without bootstrapping are provided. Also calculates F-statistics from Weir and Cockerham (1984). Various plotting features are provided, as well as Chi-square tests of genetic heterogeneity. Functionality for the calculation of various diversity parameters is possible for RAD-seq derived SNP data sets containing thousands of marker loci. A shiny application for the development of microsatellite multiplexes is also available.
